intro: Dovea, commonly known as the silverleaf dovea, is a flowering plant native to parts of Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its striking silver-gray foliage. The plant produces clusters of small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in well-drained soil and prefers full sun to partial shade. Dovea is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively easy to care for in a garden setting.
